channel.title: Need a "Unfinished Tracks" Section!
channel.description: There are too many WIPs in the finished track section... so why not just make one for WIPs

item.title: Need a "Unfinished Tracks" Section!
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Added WIP category but welcome to change it in case you think it should be a sub category, have a different name, etc. Also great if you can update the posting rules for each category.

Re-created “Contests & Challenges” and moved WIP out of it.

How about if we rename “Music Making” to e.g. “Production Talk” or “Music Talk”? Then we could be more specific about the other categories to, e.g.

  • Music Talk
  • Post Finished Tracks
  • Work in Progress
    …

Read full topic

item.title: Need a "Unfinished Tracks" Section!
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
My thoughts:

  1. Collabs & Contests are unrelated and should probably be separated.

  2. Collabs & WIP are more related and could probably be combined. They both relate to tracks that are still in progress.

  3. I wouldn’t personally add WIP as a whole new seperate category, as I’d rather add new categories or sub-categories for music production at some point.

  4. The naming approach currently used for #FinishedTracks should apply for #Collabs&WIP

  5. The old name (Music Production) was a good category title, but it wasn’t being used, so we tried to give it a new name (Making Music). In retrospect, it probably needs to be renamed again. Some members have already posted music there, because the new name invites that, which I should have anticipated. I thought of “Music Talk” or "Auxy Talk"but people will post tracks for feedback. Maybe reverting back to “Music Production” and relying on other category changes to encourage discussion about musical topics?

  6. Announcements category may be needed back.

Read full topic
